hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Discover what the Lord has enabled us to offer

services.title: Encounter God Service
services.subtitle: Weekly Sunday Worship and Teaching
services.description: Join us every Sunday at 9 AM for a powerful time of worship, teaching, and encountering the presence of God. Our services are designed to inspire and equip you for your spiritual journey.

services.title: School of the Spirit
services.subtitle: Deepen Your Spiritual Walk on Tuesdays
services.description: Join us every Tuesday at 6 PM for an immersive experience in the Word and Spirit. This service is designed to help you grow in your faith and understanding of God's voice.

services.title: Encounter Room & A Time to Contend
services.subtitle: Prayer and the word on Tuesdays and Fridays
services.description: Join us every Tuesday and Friday at 6am for a dedicated time of intercessory prayer. This service is focused on seeking God's intervention and breakthrough in our lives and communities.
